resources.string: "Tap the switch at the top-right corner to grant Doughnut the authority to control the BACK and RECENT button. After tapping the switch, the system will send a notice warning you about your personal information. Please be assured that Doughnut will not collect any personal information. System Requirements: Android 4.1 or later version"
Enable device admin to allow Doughnut to lock screen
" 「模拟按键」，需要到 设置 - 辅助功能，服务列表中 开启 悬浮菜单服务。(在顶部或者底部) 如果服务「意外关闭」，请检查是否被后台管理软件清理，然后将软件加入白名单。"
服务意外关闭，请检查是否被后台管理软件清理。如果是，请将软件加入白名单。

"Attention: If you are unable to uninstall EasyTouch after activation, please go to your mobile phone's Settings - Security - Device Administrators to deactivate EasyTouch, then proceed to uninstallation."
"If some day you don't need EasyTouch anymore, you can delete it by 'Uninstall' where at your app list."

"Because of difficult to uninstall, we got a lot one star comment by this reason, we so sorry.Can not uninstall because of the Android OS, it need deactivate 'Lock Screen' before you uninstall. So,now you can easy uninstalling EasyTouch by this way."
\u0009\u0009Please open \"Doughnut\" in the Accessibility Services, so that you can use BACK HOME and RECENT key. Tap \"Proceed with Installation\".
How to auto-start Doughnut on MIUI?
"1、Settings-Apps-Doughnut. 2、Manage premissions-open Trust this app. 3、Manage premissions-open Auto-start."
How to auto-start Doughnut on HUAWEI EMUI?
How to make the Floating Button display on MIUI?

"Follow the steps: Before MIUI v6:Setting-Apps-Doughnut-Enable floating windows, switch on, click\"End\", and then restart Doughnut. After MIUI v6:Security-Permission-Permissions-Doughnut-Popup notifications-Accept."
How to make the Floating Button display on HUAWEI EMUI?
Phone Manager-Setting icon(at the top-right corner)-Dropzone management-Doughnut check on.
What I should do when the Floating Button disappears?

Please check whether your security software has added Doughnut to the blacklist or your security software has killed it. Also you can check the option \"Display the Floating Toggle\": Doughnut Settings to make the floating button reappear.
You may not uninstall Doughnut normally, two UNINSTALL methods are as below:
"1. Click <font color='#3ec4f6'>MORE-UNINSTALL</font> button in Doughnut main menu."
"2. Or click <font color='#3ec4f6'>Help-Why I can’t uninstall Doughnut</font> in Doughnut main menu, follow the guidance to uninstall."
Auto-hide behind the soft keyboard while typing
Change the Vibrator level when touch
